backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user accounts, authentication checks, and transactions with auto-generated IDs and account numbers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing two UI-related background-image features with associated components and files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short technical summaries for build planning.
frontend/.env.development.example: Environment template configuring development mode, backend mode, and REST API base URL.
frontend/.env.example: Default environment template defining backend mode and REST API URL for user portal.
frontend/.env.staging.example: Staging environment template using REST backend mode with staging API URL placeholder.
frontend/.vscode/extensions.json: VS Code extension recommendations for linting, formatting, Tailwind, Motoko, and tooling.
frontend/.vscode/tasks.json: VS Code task definitions for installing dependencies, running dev/staging builds, starting DFX, and building frontend.
frontend/admin-portal/.env.example: Example environment config for the admin portal defining backend mode, URLs, canister ID, and environment.
frontend/admin-portal/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the admin portal root div and boots the React application.
frontend/admin-portal/README.md: Documentation explaining the admin portal's purpose, features, setup steps, environment variables, and authentication system.
frontend/admin-portal/src/AdminApp.tsx: Root React component configuring routing, theming, authentication, and global providers for the admin portal.
frontend/admin-portal/src/backend/adminB: Placeholder backend client for admin operations, supporting IC and REST modes with stubbed methods.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/aut: Route guard that restricts access to authenticated admin users and handles loading and redirection.
frontend/admin-portal/src/components/lay: Header component providing navigation, theme toggle, and admin account dropdown with logout.
Layout wrapper that includes the header, footer, and page structure for admin views.
frontend/admin-portal/src/config/env.ts: Loads and validates admin-specific environment variables for backend mode and environment settings.
frontend/admin-portal/src/contexts/Admin: LocalStorage-based admin authentication system handling signup, login, session persistence, and logout.
frontend/admin-portal/src/main.tsx: Application entry script that initializes React and renders AdminApp into the DOM.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AccessDe: Page displayed when a non-admin user tries to access restricted admin sections.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminDas: Dashboard UI showing admin welcome text and placeholder system metrics and future feature notes.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminFor: Provides an admin password reset form with email input and a confirmation message after submission.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminLog: Implements the admin login form with authentication handling, error display, and redirect on success.
frontend/admin-portal/src/pages/AdminSig: Implements admin registration with validation for name, email, password, and redirects after successful signup.
frontend/admin-portal/src/styles/admin.c: Imports shared global styles into the admin portal.
frontend/DELIVERY_PLAN_BATCHES.md: Structured delivery plan describing batch-by-batch assembly of user and admin portals with shared assets.
frontend/docs/GITHUB_ONBOARDING.md: Guide for setting up a GitHub repo and initializing project version control.
frontend/docs/LOCAL_DEVELOPMENT.md: Instructions for installing dependencies and running the project locally in different modes.
frontend/docs/VSCODE_SETUP.md: Lists recommended VS Code extensions and setup steps for development.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for theming including light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads the main React application.
frontend/README.md: Project overview and setup guide for user and admin portals with environment instructions.
frontend/REST_BACKEND_CONTRACT.md: Specification of required REST API contract, security requirements, and endpoint rules for external backend.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, providers, and protected routes for the main application structure.
frontend/src/backendClient/config.ts: Parses environment variables to select IC or REST backend mode and validates the REST base URL.
frontend/src/backendClient/icClient.ts: Implements BackendClient using a Motoko actor for account and transaction operations and mock data for markets.
frontend/src/backendClient/index.ts: Creates and caches either an IC or REST backend client based on configuration and provided actor.
frontend/src/backendClient/restClient.ts: Implements BackendClient over HTTP using fetch with auth, error handling, and bigint‑safe JSON parsing.
frontend/src/backendClient/types.ts: Defines the BackendClient interface and backend configuration types used by IC and REST clients.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Guards routes by redirecting unauthenticated users and showing a loading indicator while auth state loads.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GoldSi: Displays dummy gold and silver prices with selectors for city, karat, and weight.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/NewsCa: Shows a scrollable list of mock financial news items with category icons and a demo disclaimer.
Layout wrapper that renders header, footer, and responsive sidebar, adjusting behavior based on authentication state and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Static footer showing logo, copyright text, and a demo disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, theme toggle, mobile menu button, and authenticated user dropdown including logout and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Sidebar navigation listing main app sections, highlighting the active route and supporting mobile close behavior.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Dialog for initiating money transfers with form validation, balance checks, and submission via transfer mutation.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: LocalStorage‑based demo auth system managing signup, login, logout, and session persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identities, and exposing login state. Includes auth‑client initialization and helpers to access or clear identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as caller account and user profile. Handles auto‑refetching logic, backend mode differences, and actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useSettings.ts: Manages theme settings by syncing backend preferences with the UI and allowing theme toggling. Uses authentication state to conditionally update backend settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, CSS variables, and light/dark theme palettes. Adds a premium dark‑mode background and various utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the main App component and imports global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays account identifiers, balance details, and financial health charts. Handles loading states, backend initialization delays, and errors.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user greeting, balance, recent transactions, and dashboard widgets. Fetches profile and financial data while updating the UI with time‑based greetings.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Provides a demo password reset form that captures an email and shows confirmation messaging on submit.
frontend/src/pages/GoldSilverRatesPage.t: Displays current gold and silver rates via a card component along with informational content about metal pricing.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Implements a login form with email/password, error handling, loading states, and redirects after authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MarketInsightsPage.ts: Fetches and displays simulated market summary data with cards and a detailed table, including loading and informational alerts.
frontend/src/pages/MutualFundsPage.tsx: Shows simulated mutual fund data in cards and a detailed table, with loading states and basic performance metrics.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Allows users to view and update their profile name and theme, using backend profile data and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup form handling account creation, KYC fields, validation, and saving user profile before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/StatementsPage.tsx: Displays transaction history with filters, search, date range, export to CSV, and balance display.
frontend/src/pages/StocksPage.tsx: Fetches and displays simulated stock data with summaries, performance indicators, and a detailed table.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for transactions, settings, market data, mutual funds, and stocks.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts transactions into CSV format and triggers a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides helpers for formatting INR currency values with and without decimals.
frontend/src/utils/jsonBigint.ts: Adds JSON helpers to serialize bigints as strings and parse them back using heuristics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config enabling dark mode, content scanning, custom fonts, OKLCH-based color tokens, extended shadows, radii, and animations via plugins.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for Phase 1 of the ArthaNidhi Pay user portal.
